name: Follower (FinnBu)
description:
• Follower is a small 2d platformer, that is meant for short enjoyment, that is meant for one to explore they're inner fears. In which, this game meshes the two qualities into a game that is (hopefully) enjoyable for everyone. In which this game includes:
  • Hiding
  • Fighting
  • Exploring
  • And much more

I hope you can take the time to check it out  by downloading with the link below.

Tip: Use the Mouse cursor as a flashlight!

Perhaps interesting to note, this game was made in Python (Pygame).

Controls:

WASD and Mouse (Controls)

F to Interact

Game is in the "dist." Folder (Executable) (Labeled "Game")

Sorry if my website isn't looking too good, Im new to this. :)
